testcase.name: Cortex API Route Additional Tests > Configuration > should use Node.js runtime
Cortex API Route Additional Tests > Configuration > should force dynamic rendering
Cortex API Route Additional Tests > Configuration > should disable revalidation
Cortex API Route Additional Tests > GET Endpoint > should return successful response
Cortex API Route Additional Tests > GET Endpoint > should return correct content
Cortex API Route Additional Tests > GET Endpoint > should return response with correct headers
Cortex API Route Additional Tests > GET Endpoint > should be callable multiple times
Cortex API Route Additional Tests > GET Endpoint > should create new response instance each time
Cortex API Route Additional Tests > Response Properties > should have immutable properties
Cortex API Route Additional Tests > Response Properties > should be one-time readable
Cortex API Route Additional Tests > Response Properties > should handle cloning
Cortex API Route Additional Tests > Error Handling > should handle response consumption errors
Cortex API Route Additional Tests > Error Handling > should handle invalid response manipulation
Cortex API Route Additional Tests > Error Handling > should maintain response integrity under stress
